titles.title: O how much the Lord has blessed you!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O how much the Lord has blessed you!
Blessed you with unlimited love.
// When His children come in worship
Father offers us His embrace. //

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God has shed His grace upon you,
Gifted you life everlasting.
// And His promise is that through you
His salvation will reach others. //

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
From Isa's word let us draw strength.
"If times look rough, know I'll be there."
// Matters not just where you are,
My presence will accompany you. //
